## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0a085da2f08feb8c00f2c512e03267a7ecdf55cb417d1d0cdb1f663604f95119)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'heft-minimal-rig-test' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
